SEARCH
Package com.mygdx.game

Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a player in a particular game state.

Contains methods to get and modify the player's current game data, including as their stars, money, investments, score, items, and position on the game board. Any information about the player which is consistent across multiple game states, such as their name, level, and high score, is stored in their persistent student profile.
Author:
Joelene Hales (jhales5), Franck Limtung (flimtung), Earl Castillo (ecastil3)
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(PlayerProfile profile, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets, int stars, int money, int investments, ArrayList<ArrayList<Stock>> stocks, int score, ArrayList<Item> items, boolean frozen, boolean hasMultidice, boolean hasShield, String currentTile)
      Constructor creates a player with existing game data.
      Parameters:
      profile - Player's profile. Links the player to their persistent, out-of-game profile.
      stars - Player's stars
      money - Player's money
      investments - Player's investment account
      stocks - Player's stocks owned
      score - Player's score
      items - Player's item inventory
      frozen - Player's frozen state
      hasMultidice - If the player has a multidice item
      hasShield - If the player has a shield item
      currentTile - Player's current tile ID

    • Player

      public Player(PlayerProfile profile, com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Constructor creates a player with no existing game data. Sets all current game data to their initial values for a new game state. Used when adding a players in a new game.
      Parameters:
      profile - Player profile. Links the in-game player with their out-of-game profile

  • Method Details

    • loadTextures

      public void loadTextures(com.badlogic.gdx.assets.AssetManager assets)
      Loads the player's sprites. Includes any sprites for the player's items.
      Parameters:
      assets - Used to load assets

    • endTurn

      public void endTurn(Map<String,Node> nodeMap)
      Refreshes the player's attributes. Run at the end of the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      nodeMap - Map of nodes.

    • startTurn

      public void startTurn(Map<String,Node> nodeMap)
      Stores the player's path from the previous turns. Run at the beginning of the player's turn.
      Parameters:
      nodeMap - Map of all board nodes.

    • rollDie

      public int rollDie(Map<String,Node> nodeMap)
      Rolls the die for the player's turn.

      If the player used the multidice item, the die is rolled twice. Reachable nodes (at the distance of the number rolled) are colored green.
      Parameters:
      nodeMap - Map of all board nodes.
      Returns:
      Number rolled by the die.

    • move

      public void move(String tileID, Map<String,Node> nodeMap, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, boolean hardmode)
      Move the player to the specified position on the game board, a calls the node's activation function.

      Positions are specified by their node ID.
      Parameters:
      tileID - Node ID of position in the node map.
      nodeMap - Map of all board nodes.
      batch - SpriteBatch for rendering operations.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the given node ID does not exist in the node map.

    • getPlayerProfile

      public PlayerProfile getPlayerProfile()
      Returns the player's out-of-game profile.
      Returns:
      Player's out-of-game profile

    • getMoney

      public int getMoney()
      Returns the player's money.
      Returns:
      Player's money

    • setMoney

      public void setMoney(int amount)
      Sets the player's money to the given amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - New value for player's money.

    • getLevel

      public int getLevel()
      Returns the player's level. Corresponds to the knowledge level in the student's profile.
      Returns:
      Player's level.

    • setLevel

      public void setLevel(int level) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the player's level to the given value.

      Includes checking if the new level for the player is valid. A level is considered valid if it is a positive integer and is less than the maximum level.
      Parameters:
      level - Desired level
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the level is invalid

    • levelUp

      public void levelUp()
      Increases the student's knowledge level by one and updates the student's knowledge database.

      Includes checking if the new level for the student is valid. A level is considered valid if it is a positive integer and is less than the maximum level.

    • getStars

      public int getStars()
      Returns the player's stars.
      Returns:
      Player's stars

    • setStars

      public void setStars(int numStars)
      Sets the player's stars to the given amount.
      Parameters:
      numStars - New value for player's stars.

    • setUseMultiDice

      public void setUseMultiDice(boolean use)
      Set whether the player has a multidice item or not.
      Parameters:
      use - True if the player has a multidice item, false if otherwise.

    • getMultiDice

      public boolean getMultiDice()
      Returns an indicator if the player has a multidice item.
      Returns:
      True if the player has a multidice item, false if otherwise

    • setHasShield

      public void setHasShield(boolean has)
      Set whether the player has a shield item or not
      Parameters:
      has - True if the player has a shield item, false if otherwise

    • getHasShield

      public boolean getHasShield()
      Returns an indicator if the player has a shield item.
      Returns:
      True if the player has a shield item, false if otherwise.

    • calculateScore

      public void calculateScore()
      Calculates and sets the player's score.

      The player's score is calculated from their stars and money using the formula: Score = 1000 * stars + money + investments

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      Returns the player's score.
      Returns:
      Player's score

    • getCurrentTile

      public String getCurrentTile()
      Returns the player's current position on the game board.
      Returns:
      Player's current position on the game board.

    • setCurrentTile

      Updates the player's current position on the game board. Includes moving the player's sprite.
      Parameters:
      newTileID - Player's new position on the game board
      nodeMap - Map of all tiles on the board

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      Item removed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the player does not have an item with the given name

      Returns:

    • canMove

      public boolean canMove()
      Check if Player has moves remaining for the current turn.
      Returns:
      True if the player has at least one move remaining, false if otherwise

    • canRoll

      Returns:
      Sprite for the shield item

    • setFrozen

      public void setFrozen(boolean frozen)
      Sets the player's frozen state.

      When a player is frozen, they must skip their next turn, unless they possess a shield item.
      Parameters:
      frozen - True to freeze the player

    • isFrozen

      public boolean isFrozen()
      Check if the player is frozen.

      When a player is frozen, they must skip their next turn, unless they possess a shield item.
      Returns:
      True if the player is frozen, false if otherwise.

    • useShield

      public boolean useShield()
      Call this function when the shield could be used.

      If the shield is active, it will return true.
      Returns:
      True if the shield is active or false otherwise

    • getCurrentInvestments

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Stock>> getCurrentInvestments()
      Get all stocks that the player has invested in
      Returns:
      All stocks that the player has invested in

    • addInvestments

      public void addInvestments(Stock newInvestment, int stockNum)
      Adds a new stock to the player's stock portfolio and updates the player's money and investment account.
      Parameters:
      newInvestment - The new Stock to add to the list
      stockNum - Stock type from the 6 available stocks to pick from

    • removeInvestment

      public void removeInvestment(Stock stock, int stockNum)
      Removes a stock from the player's list.
      Parameters:
      stock - The current price of the stock to remove
      stockNum - what type of stock

    • updateInvestment

      public void updateInvestment(Stock[] updatedStocks)
      Updates the list of stocks. Used to simulate stock market dynamics
      Parameters:
      updatedStocks - Updated list of stocks.

    • getInvestments

      public int getInvestments()
      Returns the total value of the player's investment account
      Returns:
      Total value of investment account
